name: 5SPOTS
description:
This is a casual game. Easy to play: Just click the left mouse button on the different parts of the two pictures. Each level has five stubble points. Find out all the stubble points of the current picture and you can enter the next picture smoothly until all the stubble points of the pictures at each level are found on time.

characteristic:

It is necessary to find out the difference between the two pictures to play games.

While finding fault, your observation ability will also be exercised!
